segments.text: Will you help me take these things to the car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , which car do you want me to put them in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bring them to my wife's car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The blue SUV in front of the Honda .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That chair over there , but please be careful with it . It was a gift from my mother-in-law .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , I won't drop it . Wow , it's really heavy . I don't think I can move it by myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me help you with that . I don't want you to hurt your back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are you taking all this stuff ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't I tell you ? We're moving to Florida ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're moving now ? I knew you were moving , but I thought you said you were moving next month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's true , but my wife found a new apartment on the Internet the other day and she wants to move right away .
segments.speaker: S1
